channel.title: Run Help!
channel.description: Hi, When i run my source (hybrid PVP v2) I click run and a a black box opens up for like 1 second and closes. i don't know what to do about this any suggestions? i was able to find out though it says the path not specified. and iv have tried multiple times to specify it and i'm clueless i have looked at 2-3 tutorials. and nothing please help!

item.title: Run Help!
item.dc:creator: @xXxSkillerxXx xXxSkillerxXx
item.description:
@xXxSkillerxXx wrote:

Hi, When i run my source (hybrid PVP v2) I click run and a a black box opens up for like 1 second and closes. i don’t know what to do about this any suggestions? i was able to find out though it says the path not specified. and iv have tried multiple times to specify it and i’m clueless i have looked at 2-3 tutorials. and nothing please help!
